channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Nvidia launches Alpamayo, open AI models that allow autonomous vehicles to ‘think like a human’
item.description: Nvidia unveiled Alpamayo at CES 2026, which includes a reasoning vision language action model that allows an autonomous vehicle to think more like a human and provide chain-of-thought reasoning.

item.title: TII’s Falcon H1R 7B can out-reason models up to 7x its size — and it’s (mostly) open
item.description: For the last two years, the prevailing logic in generative AI has been one of brute force: if you want better reasoning, you need a bigger model. While "small" models (under 10 billion parameters) have become capable conversationalists, they have historically crumbled when asked to perform multi-step logical deduction or complex mathematical proofs.Today, the Technology Innovation Institute (TII) in Abu Dhabi is challenging that scaling law with the release of Falcon H1R 7B. By abandoning the pure Transformer orthodoxy in favor of a hybrid architecture, TII claims to have built a 7-billion par...

item.title: How to watch the AMD CES 2026 keynote with CEO Lisa Su live
item.description: AMD is kicking off CES 2026 on Monday, where it'll cover its latest AI developments and perhaps show off its newest Ryzen chips. The company will outline the full scope of its vision for AI implementations across the full spectrum of consumer and enterprise applications. The presentation — which is the lead keynote for CES 2026 — will be led by CEO Dr. Lisa Su. We'll tell you how to tune in to the livestream and what else you can expect to see. How to watch AMD's keynote live Dr. Su will deliver a keynote speech from the Palazzo Ballroom at the Venetian on Monday, January 5 at 9:30PM ET (6:30P...

item.title: Intel at CES 2026: Live updates from the Core Ultra Series 3 Panther Lake launch event
item.description: SOPA Images via Getty Images CES 2026 is off and running, and chipmakers enabling the AI moment are one of the big starts of the show. In addition to NVIDIA and AMD taking the stage today, we'll also be getting Intel's 2026 launch event. The chip giant is expected to provide more details on its AI PC initiative and the new processors powering it: The Core Ultra Series 3 CPUs (aka Panther Lake) are made using an 18A process — that's 18 angstroms, or just under 2nm — and designed for high-end laptops and gaming devices. For Intel, the stakes at CES are higher than ever. In the past 12 months, bo...

item.title: Hackers claim breach of engineering firm, offer sale of info on three major US utilities
item.description: Investigations are underway but the data seems to be quite valuable.

item.title: On a vu la nouvelle batterie solaire d’Ecoflow capable d’alimenter toute une maison (et bien plus)
item.description: La nouvelle batterie solaire d'Ecoflow est un monstre de puissance, qui prend tout son sens en France avec les nouvelles réglementations sur les installations solaires. On a pu approcher la bête au CES.

item.title: Hurry, you only have a few days to back the world's fastest mini PC — and it even comes with a translucent touchscreen
item.description: The AquaTouch mini PC integrates high-performance Ryzen components, a translucent touchscreen, user-upgradeable hardware, and modern connectivity in a compact 9-liter case.

item.title: Amazon dévoile l’Ember Artline : le rival du Samsung The Frame à prix cassé
item.description: Un écran brillant dans un salon lumineux, c'est l'enfer. Amazon l'a compris et lance sa nouvelle gamme Ember Artline. Au programme : une dalle QLED mate traitée antireflet qui se fond dans le décor. L'objectif n'est pas de battre l'OLED sur les noirs, mais de faire disparaître la tech de votre mur.

item.title: The Year Ahead in TV
item.description: Brand-new shows that take place on familiar turf are a big theme for 2026—a year that's also stuffed full of highly anticipated returns.

item.title: How 2026 tax changes could leave more money in your paycheck
item.description: Inflation-adjusted tax brackets and new withholding rules under Trump’s tax law may boost take-home pay for some workers. Your paycheck could be a little bigger in 2026, even if you didn’t get a New Year’s raise. That’s because, in order to adjust for inflation, the IRS made some major changes to the tax code last year.

item.title: How to watch the Hyundai CES 2026 press conference live
item.description: Hyundai CES has long felt like a full-on auto show, but the car-centric energy seems somewhat muted at CES 2026. Sure, the Afeela electric vehicle from the Sony-Honda joint venture is returning to the show floor, but with the Trump administration yanking most EV incentives from the market, the industry isn't offering a full-court press of new vehicles in Las Vegas this year. That includes Hyundai. While the company's Mobis subsidiary will present "more than 30 mobility convergence technologies" during CES week — including its Holographic Windshield Display — we're hearing the Korean auto giant...

item.title: « 30 % plus rapide », Amazon repense totalement l’interface Fire TV : voici ce qui va changer
item.description: Si vous avez une Fire TV, vous connaissez ce petit moment de frustration : le lag au démarrage, les menus chargés, la lenteur. Amazon semble avoir (enfin) compris le message. L'interface fait peau neuve en ce début 2026 avec une promesse forte : 30 % de rapidité en plus.

item.title: Paris court finds 10 people guilty of cyberbullying Brigitte Macron
item.description: A Paris court has found 10 people guilty of cyberbullying Brigitte Macron, wife of President of France Emmanuel Macron, the BBC reports. The judge found that the defendants made false claims about Macron's gender and sexuality, and "malicious remarks" about the 24-year age gap between Macron and her spouse.The defendants, eight men and two women, received a range of sentences, including jail time up to eight months and mandatory online harassment awareness training. Five of the defendants will also lose access to their X accounts for six months, according to The New York Times.Key to the lawsu...

item.title: Fini les gadgets : j’ai vu ces deux bagues connectées Pebble et Vocci qui rendent l’IA (enfin) utile au quotidien
item.description: Les bagues connectées entrent dans une nouvelle ère, grâce à l'intelligence artificielle. Elles deviennent plus pratique. La preuve avec le Pebble 01 Index et Vocci que nous avons pu voir au CES 2026 de Las Vegas.

item.title: NVIDIA is reportedly bringing back 2021's RTX 3060 GPU because AI is eating all of the newer cards
item.description: A reputable leaker has indicated that NVIDIA plans on bringing the RTX 3060 back to market, according to reports by Kotaku and WFCCTech. It first released the GPU at the beginning of 2021. The leaker Hongxing2020 indicates that NVIDIA will resume production of the 3060 sometime in the next few months. Why is the world's most valuable company reportedly bringing back such an antiquated graphics card? You know the answer. It's the endless gaping maw known as AI. Tech companies have been hoovering up PC parts for AI applications with reckless abandon. It has become a legitimate challenge for a re...

item.title: Everything announced at CES 2026
item.description: It's the first week of a new year and there's no time for the tech world to slowly ease back into things following the holidays. That's because CES 2026 is in full swing, with all manner of companies descending on Las Vegas to reveal their latest innovations and what they're planning to bring your way in the near future. Many of the Engadget crew are on the ground to check out as much of the new tech as possible. Of course, we're keeping tabs on all of the major CES press conferences too. Samsung has already held its First Look presentation, which focuses on home products, while LG has shown o...

item.title: Garmin unveils a new rugged cam designed to cover blind spots — and it's the safety device truck drivers need
item.description: The Garmin dēzl DualView system comprises two rugged exterior cameras and a transmitter, delivering surrounding vehicle alerts and coverage of a truck's remaining blind spots.

item.title: Microsoft Office, c’est fini : la décision folle et inconséquente de Satya Nadella
item.description: Microsoft met fin à l'une des marques les plus reconnues de l'informatique de ces 35 dernières années.

item.title: Nvidia's CES 2026 keynote live - all the latest news from the GPU and AI superpower
item.description: What will the GPU giant unveil at CES 2026? We have all the breaking news

item.title: CES 2026 live updates: See the latest news, surprises, and strange tech from LG, Samsung, Lego, and new startups
item.description: CES 2026 is finally here, and Mashable reporters are on the ground looking for the best in show. Get live updates from the showroom floor and behind the scenes.

item.title: Does self-improvement in 2026 start on TikTok?
item.description: The 365 buttons trend, explained. How seriously are you taking your 2026 rebrand? Do you have your 365 buttons ready?

item.title: The UK just banned junk food ads before 9pm and across the internet
item.description: Even foods perceived as healthy, including some cereals and sandwiches, fall under the new restrictions. For Americans, the idea of watching live television without the constant barrage of commercials for prescription medications and junk food might seem foreign. That’s now the norm in the United Kingdom.

item.title: LG Sound Suite hands-on at CES 2026: Home theater powered by Dolby Atmos FlexConnect
item.description: Dolby introduced its FlexConnect technology a few years ago, vowing that it would allow customers to position soundbars and speakers anywhere in a room. The company said the platform would then reconfigure the sound automatically, taking into account any locations that may be further away from the center sweet spot. At CES 2026, LG is the first to put Dolby Atmos FlexConnect in a soundbar, offering the so-called Sound Suite that also includes satellite speaker options and a subwoofer. You don’t need every member of the lineup to use Dolby’s tech, so you can pick and choose which items work bes...

item.title: Nouveaux LEGO Star Wars avec briques « Smart Play » : voici « la plus grosse évolution depuis 50 ans »
item.description: C'est probablement l'annonce la plus excitante du CES 2026 pour les grands enfants que nous sommes (ou que je suis). LEGO lance le Smart Play. L'idée ? Une brique intelligente capable de détecter les mouvements et de communiquer avec les autres, sans l'horrible design des sets Mario. La marque promet la plus grosse évolution depuis 50 ans.

item.title: Working on the go? You can no longer activate Windows with your phone
item.description: By all accounts, Microsoft isn't letting you activate Windows from your phone anymore, so make sure you have an internet connection.

item.title: More Than 40 Million People Use ChatGPT Daily for Healthcare Advice, OpenAI Claims
item.description: OpenAI wants ChatGPT to be a bigger player in healthcare. First, they need regulators to play ball.

item.title: Pourquoi le nouveau chargeur Anker Nano risque de devenir votre indispensable
item.description: Anker ne s'est pas calmé pour ce CES 2026. La marque vient de lâcher une avalanche d'accessoires, du chargeur minuscule capable d'alimenter un MacBook Air à la station d'accueil qui se transforme en hub nomade.

item.title: Transporter de l’électricité grâce à la lumière : c’est possible avec cette technologie intégrée à une serrure connectée
item.description: La recharge sans fil, par voie optique, sans aucun câble, devient une réalité avec cette serrure connectée qu'on a pu voir dans les allées du CES. L'idée : pouvoir recharger une batterie à 4 mètres de distance, uniquement avec de la lumière. Ça fonctionne vraiment, et c'est bientôt disponible.

item.title: CES 2026 day 1: the 11 best gadgets we've seen so far, from smart lights to LG's new OLEDs
item.description: CES 2026 has kicked off in style, and we've been busy finding the highlights from the show floor in Las Vegas.

item.title: Samsung CEO Says What We Already Know About the Memory Shortage
item.description: It's a new year. Start pinching those pennies!

item.title: These On-Ear Beats Headphones Are Marked Down by $70
item.description: What these headphones lack in active noise canceling, they make up for with big, bold sound.

item.title: The biggest TV announcements at CES 2026
item.description:
CES is once again where TV manufacturers lay out their plans for the year ahead, and CES 2026 is shaping up to be a showcase of both familiar rivalries and genuinely new display tech. While OLED and Mini LED remain central to most lineups, Micro RGB has emerged as one of the most talked-about developments at the show so far, especially at the higher end of the market. Below are the TV announcements that stood out most from the pre-show events and early press conferences, with more expected as CES continues. Samsung Micro RGB TVs
Samsung's flagship Micro RGB TV
Engadget
Samsung’s M...

item.title: Cette vieille carte graphique fait son retour en 2026 : Nvidia change ses plans
item.description: On pensait l'avoir enterrée fin 2024. C'était mal connaître Nvidia. Face à une crise de la mémoire vive qui fait exploser les coûts, le géant vert s'apprête à ressortir sa GeForce RTX 3060 du placard.

item.title: This Health Band Is Like if Whoop Went Wild With Voice Assistants
item.description: The Luna Band is all about yelling at your wrist.

item.title: The Duffer Brothers Have No Idea Why They Tried to Answer So Many ‘Stranger Things’ Questions Last Week
item.description: 'I'm, like, fried,' Matt Duffer explained in the wake of the Netflix hit's big finale, which we can certainly understand.

item.title: Lego debuts Smart Play system that reacts as you play. Heres how it works.
item.description: At CES 2026, Lego announced the imminent launch of the Lego Smart Play system, one of the biggest evolutions in brick-building technology in decades.

item.title: Lego’s Smart Brick Gives the Iconic Analog Toy a New Digital Brain
item.description: The new sensor-packed Smart Play Brick will land this spring as part of a special Star Wars collection. The update adds interactive lights and sound to the Lego experience—including the minifigs.

item.title: Lego announces Smart Brick, the ‘most significant evolution’ in 50 years
item.description: On March 1st, 2026, The Lego Group will begin selling the most ambitious brick it's ever made: a tiny computer that fits entirely inside a classic 2×4 Lego brick. When it detects NFC-equipped smart tags nearby, embedded inside new Lego tiles and new Lego minifigures, or when it sees other Smart Bricks, the company claims […]

item.title: Lego unveils a technology-packed Smart Brick at CES 2026
item.description: Lego bricks come in a ridiculously vast array of sizes and shapes, but the company is unveiling an entirely new take on its classic shape at CES 2026. Meet the Lego Smart Brick, a standard-sized 2 x 4 brick that’s packed with modern technology to enable sets that can respond to how they’re played with or the sets you build. It’s part of a new initiative called Smart Play, which encompasses the Smart Brick as well as Smart Minifigures and Smart Tags. While we obviously don’t know yet how Lego fans will take to this new system, it’s still fair to say it’s the biggest move Lego has every made to ...

item.title: Grindr for lesbians? Here are the best dating apps for LGBTQ women.
item.description: Looking for love, friends, or casual fun? We've curated a list of the best dating apps for lesbians, from HER to Hinge.

item.title: Elon Musk promet un voyage vers Mars en 2026… mais son Starship est-il vraiment prêt ?
item.description: Après une année 2025 marquée par plusieurs déconvenues pour SpaceX, l'entreprise d'Elon Musk attend beaucoup de son Starship pour 2026. Mais peut-elle réaliser l'impossible et faire face aux nombreux défis techniques qui attendent son lanceur lourd ?

item.title: Hacktivist deletes white supremacist websites live onstage during hacker conference
item.description: A hacker known as Martha Root broke in and deleted three white supremacist websites at the end of a talk during the annual hacker conference Chaos Communication Congress in Germany.

item.title: The Lego brick just got its biggest upgrade yet with Smart Play — and it's coming to Star Wars sets first
item.description: Similar looks, but supercharged internals

item.title: Verge announces world-first motorcycle with solid-state batteries –and it promises a 370-mile range with 10-minute charge times
item.description: Verge Motorcycles unlocks ten-minute charge times with world-first all solid-sate battery in a bike.

item.title: How to watch Nigeria vs. Mozambique online for free
item.description: How to watch AFCON for free. Live stream Nigeria vs. Mozambique in the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations for free.

item.title: Ce mini PC modulaire réalise un vieux fantasme et c’est malin
item.description: La quête de l'anneau unique est un vieux fantasme de la tech. Au CES 2026, la marque Khadas en propose un aboutissement grâce à Intel Panther Lake.

item.title: That viral Reddit post about food delivery apps was an AI scam
item.description: A viral Reddit confessional about a "major food delivery app" posted January 2nd is most likely AI-generated. The original post by user Trowaway_whistleblow alleged that an unnamed food delivery company regularly delays customer orders, calls couriers "human assets," and exploits their "desperation" for cash, among other indefensible actions. Nearly 90,000 upvotes and four days later, […]...

item.title: J’ai vu le Honor Robot Phone avec sa caméra articulée et j’en suis ressorti avec plus de questions que de réponses
item.description: Au CES 2026, Honor dévoile le Robot Phone, un étonnant smartphone à caméra articulée. Simple concept ou véritable révolution mobile ? Cette première prise en main soulève de nombreuses questions sur les ambitions de la marque chinoise.

item.title: Flu virus tracker: Latest update shows high influenza activity across most states. Watch out for these symptoms
item.description: After reporting was delayed due to the holidays, new CDC data shows the flu is spreading, with 33,000 people hospitalized during the last week of the year. As today is the first Monday of 2026, Americans across the country are settling back into their everyday routines after the busy holiday season.

item.title: You Can Play Chess in Hyperbolic Space Now, and It Sucks
item.description: It may not be particularly fun yet, but it's weird!

item.title: U.S. quietly expands list of countries whose citizens must pay up to $15,000 bonds for visas
item.description: Bhutan, Botswana, the Central African Republic, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Namibia, and Turkmenistan are now on the list. The Trump administration has added seven countries, including five in Africa, to the list of nations whose passport holders are required to post bonds of up to $15,000 to apply to enter the United States.
